text: 11|52|‘He mora sampradaya! Tomaloke nija pratipalakara ocarata ksama praarthana karaa, tara pichata te'omra phale'i ubhati aha. Te'om tomalokara oparata dharaasara barasuna barsaba; arau te'om tomalokaka sakti pradana karai saktisali karaiba arau (suna) tomaloke aparaadhi hai mukha ghuraa'i nalaba’.
